input:
dear bittu,
       i am going to take all your money. i will do thyis by this time.
output:
I hope you are doing well.

Dear bittu,
       i am going to take all your money. i will do thyis by this time.

Could you please take a moment to look into this? I would truly appreciate your support. Thank you.
